bug.short_desc: syslinux-splash.png and syslinux-vesa-splash.png are in the wrong directory
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The syslinux-splash.png and syslinux-vesa-splash.png files are currently in /usr/share/anaconda/pixmaps in generic-logos.
However, lorax and its templates expect them to be in /usr/share/anaconda/boot instead. The fedora-logos package has it in the right place, but generic-logos does not, which leads to debranded spins of Fedora failing to compose due to path mismatch.
The syslinux-splash.png and syslinux-vesa-splash.png files need to move to /usr/share/anaconda/boot, to match fedora-logos in its location, permitting the usage of standard lorax templates to compose live ISOs.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 17.0.0-8.fc24
How reproducible: Always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Fork any of the fedora kickstarts for any of the editions/spins and swap fedora-release* and fedora-logos for generic-release and generic logos 2. Use livemedia-creator to attempt an ISO compose.
Actual results: ISO creation fails because file isn't found
Expected results: ISO creation succeeds
Additional info:
This affects Fedora Rawhide, 24, and 23, too.

Proposed as a Freeze Exception for 25-final by Fedora user ngompa using the blocker tracking app because:
Without moving the files to the correct location, building remixes/spins not using fedora-logos is not possible without forking lorax templates.
In most cases, this is complete overkill and a lot more work to keep up, especially in light of a rather simple fix.
I'm inclined to vote +1 FE here. There should be no risk to blocking media at all, since of course they use the branded fedora-logos package.
generic-logos-18.0.0-1.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-9c546a3aa3

Discussed at 2016-11-14 freeze exception review meeting: https://meetbot-raw.fedoraproject.org/fedora-blocker-review/2016-11-14/f25-blocker-review.2016-11-14-17.00.html . Accepted as a freeze exception issue as this is useful for respins and, as it's only in generic-logos, cannot possibly affect any release blocking deliverables.

generic-logos-18.0.0-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-9c546a3aa3
generic-logos-18.0.0-1.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
